alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 3:33PM MST until December 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches with locally heavier amounts on the Camas prairie. Additionally there could be light ice accumulations that develop overnight due to freezing rain. * WHERE...Alpowa Summit, Kamiah, Peck, Winchester, Lewiston Grade, Craigmont, Pomeroy, Lapwai, Soldiers Meadow Road, Lewiston, Nezperce, Clarkston, Gifford, and Culdesac. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties; Lewiston Area
